item.title: 钯金公司 Kymera 正在与贷款人商谈再融资和收购公司事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，材料公司 Kymera International 正在与包括私人信贷公司在内的贷款机构洽谈债务再融资和支付潜在收购费用的事宜。【原文：Materials company Kymera International is in conversations with lenders, including private credit firms, to refinance its debt and pay for a potential acquisition, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Ares 认为并购驱动型私人信贷的机会正在增加
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Ares Management Corp. 预计今年晚些时候交易量将有所回升，此前该公司报告称，本季度新并购活动的贷款额度不高。【原文：Ares Management Corp. anticipates a pickup in deals later this year after the alternative-asset manager reported a muted quarter for lending to new mergers and acquisitions activity.】

item.title: ICICI 证券任命两位银行家为 ECM 业务联席主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度工业信贷投资银行（ICICI Bank Ltd. ）任命了两位资深银行家担任其投资银行部门股票资本市场部的负责人。【原文：ICICI Bank Ltd. named two senior bankers to head the equity capital markets division of its investment banking unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Cinven 放弃 10 亿英镑的出售计划，寻求为 JLA 再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司 Cinven 在取消出售英国公司 JLA 的计划后，正寻求为这家商业服务公司进行再融资。【原文：Buyout firm Cinven is looking to refinance business services firm JLA after pulling a planned sale of the UK company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 首席执行官认为农民农作物支出前景良好，Corteva 公司业绩上升
item.description: 种子和农药生产商 Corteva Inc. 公布的季度收益超出预期，其首席执行官表示农民支出前景强劲，此后该公司股价创下三个月来最大涨幅。【原文：Corteva Inc. shares rose the most in three months after the seed and pesticide maker posted quarterly earnings that beat expectations while its CEO signaled a strong outlook for farmer spending.】

item.title: 股价飙升，Carvana 空头损失达 39 亿美元
item.description: Carvana Co.周四的大涨加重了做空者的痛苦，在过去一年里，随着二手车零售商股价的反弹，做空者押注该公司的损失惨重。【原文：Carvana Co.’s surge Thursday added to pain for short sellers who’ve amassed major losses betting against the used car retailer as its shares have rebounded over the last year.】

item.title: 太阳马戏团联合主席的公司考虑进行埃弗顿融资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，专门从事不良债务业务的私募股权公司 GDA Luma Capital 已成为埃弗顿俱乐部收购案的潜在拯救者。【原文：GDA Luma Capital, a private equity firm specializing in distressed debt, has emerged as a potential rescuer of a takeover bid for Everton FC, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第五周上升，达到 7.22
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率连续第五周攀升，加大了购房者的压力。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US climbed for a fifth week, ratcheting up the pressure on homebuyers.】

item.title: 安盛与阿波罗旗下 Athora 在德国取消人寿保险交易
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Athora Holding Ltd., an insurance affiliate of Apollo Global Management Inc., and Axa SA have terminated a deal to transfer life insurance policies in Germany almost two years after announcing it.】

item.title: KKR 面向大众富裕阶层的投资工具融资 18 亿美元
item.description: KKR & Co.努力向所谓的大众富裕阶层伸出援手，通过单一渠道从 12,000 多名投资者那里筹集了 17.8 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co.’s effort to reach the so-called mass affluent raised $1.78 billion from more than 12,000 investors in a single vehicle.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司 24 年来首次出现净亏损
item.description: 俄罗斯国家控制的天然气巨头报告称，由于向欧洲的运输量下降和燃料价格下降，该公司自 1999 年以来首次出现年度净亏损。【原文：Russia’s state-controlled gas giant reported its first annual net loss since 1999 on falling shipments to Europe and lower prices for the fuel.】

item.title: SPAC 老将克莱因回归，近三年来首次进行 IPO
item.description: 老牌交易商迈克尔-克莱因（Michael Klein）近三年来首次重返空头支票领域，在此之前，这一曾经红极一时的投资风潮已经破灭，保荐人和投资者为此损失了数十亿美元。【原文：Veteran dealmaker Michael Klein has returned to the blank-check arena for the first time in nearly three years, after the once red-hot investing trend went bust and cost sponsors and investors billions.】

item.title: 野村和瑞穗在基金交易失败后面临 1.08 亿美元损失
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc）和瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc）正面临着超过 1 亿美元的潜在损失，这些损失与投资基金 All Blue Capital 的一系列失败股票交易有关。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. and Mizuho Financial Group Inc. are facing more than $100 million of potential losses tied to a series of failed stock trades made by investment fund All Blue Capital.】

item.title: 夜视公司 Exosens 在巴黎首次公开募股中募集 4 亿欧元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国夜视技术公司 Exosens 正计划在巴黎进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能在 3 亿至 4 亿欧元之间。【原文：French night-vision technology company Exosens is planning an initial public offering in Paris that may raise between €300 million and €400 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财政部将为期六周的票据销售规模扩大至 750 亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部周四增加了定于下周举行的六周期票据拍卖规模，以确保有足够的流动性满足月底的现金需求。【原文：The US Treasury on Thursday increased the size of its six-week bill auction slated for next week to ensure it has enough liquidity to meet cash needs around the end of the month.】

item.title: Sunnova 首席执行官表示正在评估深度贴现债务的各种选择方案
item.description: 陷入困境的屋顶太阳能公司 Sunnova Energy International Inc. 首席执行官在发布第一季度业绩后表示，该公司正在评估其公司债务的各种选择。【原文：Sunnova Energy International Inc. is evaluating options for its corporate debt, the struggling rooftop solar company’s chief executive officer said following the release of first-quarter results.】

item.title: 罗纳尔多的沙特联赛主场有望拍摄系列纪录片
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，罗纳尔多和小内马尔所在的沙特阿拉伯足球联赛正在洽谈制作系列纪录片，希望将其出售给 Netflix 等流媒体公司。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s football league, home to Ronaldo and Neymar Jr., is in talks to produce a documentary series it hopes to sell to streaming companies such as Netflix Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷筹资创 2020 年以来最低水平
item.description: 由于通胀率居高不下，美联储又让投资者做好了利率将在更长时间内保持高位的准备，私人信贷资金的筹集创下了2020年以来的最低水平。【原文：Private credit fundraising scraped the lowest level in any quarter since 2020 as inflation remains stubbornly high and the Federal Reserve primes investors for interest rates to stay elevated for longer.】

item.title: 前塞甘提资本交易员拉罗卡不再加入摩根大通
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，被指控在香港进行内幕交易的 Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 前交易员丹尼尔-拉罗卡（Daniel La Rocca）不会按计划加入摩根大通。【原文：Daniel La Rocca, a former trader at Segantii Capital Management Ltd. accused of insider dealing in Hong Kong, won’t be joining JPMorgan Chase & Co. as planned, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗集团的霍伦霍斯特逆流而上，认为利率将大幅下调，并将硬着陆
item.description:
他说，"从所有数据来看，就业市场的趋势是疲软"

。【原文：

Look at all the data points, he says, and ‘that trend is toward a weaker job market’

】

item.title: 拖拉机制造商 CNH 和 AGCO 因农民需求疲软而下调业绩展望
item.description: 拖拉机制造商 CNH Industrial NV 和 AGCO Corp.下调了 2024 年的业绩展望，原因是种植者继续受到农作物价格下跌的挤压，农机销售量下降。【原文：Tractor makers CNH Industrial NV and AGCO Corp. reduced their outlooks for 2024 on declining sales of farm machinery as growers continue to be squeezed by falling crop prices.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯称他开创的 "全收益 "策略 "已死
item.description: 比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）在 20 世纪 80 年代开创了 "总回报 "策略，彻底改变了债券市场，他说这种方法现在已经过时了。【原文：Bill Gross, who pioneered the “total return” strategy in the 1980s that revolutionized the bond market, says the approach is now defunct.】

item.title: 期权交易员为一年来最大的 S&P 就业日波动做好准备
item.description: 期权市场押注周五美国就业报告公布后股市将大幅波动，交易商预计该报告将进一步明确美联储今年可能降息的幅度。【原文：The options market is betting that stocks will swing widely after Friday’s US jobs report, which traders expect will offer more clarity on how much the Federal Reserve may cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 比特币矿商酝酿出售，Stronghold Digital股价大涨
item.description: Stronghold Digital Mining Inc.正在权衡出售公司和其他替代方案，因为比特币代码更新 "减半 "后，挖矿收入大幅减少，竞争日益激烈。【原文：Stronghold Digital Mining Inc. is weighing the sale of the company and other alternatives with competition increasing in the wake of a Bitcoin code update called the “halving” that drastically reduces mining revenue.】

item.title: 顶级煤矿企业利润增长 26%，员工成本下降
item.description: 全球最大的煤炭生产商印度煤炭有限公司（Coal India Ltd.）第四季度利润增长了 26%，主要得益于工资支出的下降和向客户发货量的增加。【原文：Coal India Ltd., the world’s largest producer of the commodity, reported a 26% increase in fourth-quarter profit, driven by a drop in salary expenses and higher shipments to customers.】

item.title: 假化肥可能导致肯尼亚农业部长下台
item.description: 在政府机构通过补贴项目分发假化肥之后，肯尼亚议员要求解除该国农业部长的职务，这是威廉-鲁托总统的政府遭遇的最新丑闻。【原文：Kenyan lawmakers are demanding the dismissal of the nation’s agriculture secretary after government agencies distributed fake fertilizer through a subsidy program, the latest scandal to hit President William Ruto’s government.】

item.title: 花旗集团称欧元区第一季度薪酬增长保持坚挺
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）经济学家表示，欧元区第一季度的工资谈判可能未能放缓，这主要归功于德国的工资谈判加速。【原文：Negotiated wages in the euro area probably failed to slow in the first quarter, thanks mostly to an acceleration in Germany, according to Citigroup economists.】

item.title: 诺和诺德的交易价格大幅低于礼来，即使涨幅已达 350
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）在过去四年中的涨幅超过 350%，如果这家减肥药公司要缩小与美国竞争对手的差距，可能还需要继续努力。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S’s more than 350% rally over the past four years may have further to run if the weight-loss drug firm is to close the gap with its US competitor.】

item.title: 盎格鲁值多少钱？目前它的价值低于其各部分的总和
item.description: 在必和必拓集团考虑下一步行动之际，矿业界的银行家、分析师和竞争对手生产商的高管们面临着一个大问题：英美资源集团到底值多少钱？【原文：As BHP Group considers its next move, there’s one big question facing the mining world’s bankers, analysts and executives at rival producers: What’s Anglo American Plc actually worth?】

item.title: 有了 ZiG，津巴布韦有望最终扭转通胀局面
item.description: 津巴布韦中央银行表示，津巴布韦以黄金为支撑的新货币 ZiG 将消除阻碍经济发展的高通胀，并使这个南部非洲国家成为物价压力失控的典型代表。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new gold-backed ZiG currency will banish sky-high inflation that’s hamstrung the economy and made the southern African nation a poster child for runaway price pressures, the central bank said.】
